resources.string:
Hi, my name is Somesh Bachani. 

I am a student at Galgotias University 

This in an Intro APP that I have developed. 

It is supported via Kotlin. 

It was made in android studio. 

I am a 3rd year student who is learning to develop a Kotlin APP. 

I like programming. 

A Fact about me :- I Assembled my first PC in Class 10 and made my first Robot in class 7. 

I try to keep learning new things Soon I will make an app for people to make their portfolio and export as PDF. 

I have a github profile that I try to update regularly. 

I have done 3 internships till now. 

I want to become a software developer someday. 

My main programming language is python.
